articles.title: PepsiCo trims revenue outlook as North American snacking, key international markets lag - CNBC
articles.description: PepsiCo lowered its full-year outlook for organic revenue but reiterated its forecast for its earnings growth.
articles.content:
PepsiCo on Tuesday lowered its full-year outlook for organic revenue after its second straight quarter of weaker-than-expected sales.
